name: lol-tools
description: As a avid follower of the professional League of Legends scene, I have always been very interested in the ban/pick phase (or the draft phase) of the game. There are many tools out there that can assist you with it, but I want to make my own tools that I can tweak to my own interests. Thus, this project was born.

scripts.build: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
